author: Special Correspondent
text:
Collector M. Ravikumar pasting voter awareness sticker on the door of a house at Vilathikulam on Sunday.— Photo: N. Rajesh

Collector M. Ravikumar participated in voter awareness programmes organised at Vilaththikulam in the district on Sunday to encourage the electorate to cast their votes without fail on May 16.

Leading the awareness procession that commenced at Circuit House, Mr. Ravikumar walked along with the rallyists to reach the Vilaththikulam taluk office via Ettaiyapuram Road, bus-stand and the main bazaar. The Collector distributed awareness pamphlets to the public and stuck stickers in ATMs, buses, autos and lorries.

He also administered the voter awareness pledge to the rallyists and the public upon the rally reaching the taluk office. Sub-Collector (Training) Pradeep Kumar, Revenue Divisional Officer, Kovilpatti, Kannapiran and senior officers participated in the rally.

The Collector also visited a few homes for the aged and asked the inmates to cast their votes.
title: Collector leads voter awareness programmes
